name: The Milkman
description:
!Web version is glitchier, not as smooth and easy to control as downloaded version.

Story:

You must help the milk delivery guy, who's name just so happens to be "Milkman", deliver milk to your office, so your child can enjoy a wonderful bowl of cereal with milk! Be quick, but also careful, as another milk delivery business has caught word about your delivery, and have sent mercenaries to assasinate you and Milkman. Use your telekinesis to throw objects at your enemies, or take over their bodies!

Controls:
1) Hold left click to pick up objects, upon releasing, the objects will be thrown at high velocity! (Physics can't even keep up!)
 2) Press "E" to take over your enemies!
 3) Of course "WASD" to move, and mouse to look around!

Made by the "E-server" development team!
We hope you have as much fun playing this, as we did making it!

Credits:
 Potato - 3D model and level design.
 TomatoChips - Programming.
 Fetusman - UI and 2D design.
 Yuki - Sound effect and music design.

Used assets (not self made): 
 1) https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/free-skybox-extended-shader-10...

Bugfixes:
 1) Fixed sound disappearing on scene change.
 2) Fixed final battle door not opening
